Class: ReactPlayerLoader

ReactPlayerLoader(props)

The official React component for the Brightcove Player! This uses @brightcove/player-loader to load a player into a React component based on the given props.

Constructor

new ReactPlayerLoader(props)

Create a new Brightcove player.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

Most options will be passed along to player-loader, except for options that are listed. The exception is refNode/refNodeInsert which will be ignored, as they are used internally to get this component to work.

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
baseUrl string <optional>

The base URL to use when requesting a player
attrs Object <optional>

Used to set attributes on the component element that contains the embedded Brightcove Player.
Source:
  • index.js, line 48

Methods

componentDidMount()

Called just after the component has mounted on the DOM (right after render()).Will only be called in the web browser.

Source:
  • index.js, line 61

componentWillUnmount()

Called just before a component unmounts from the DOM. Cleans up the player.

Source:
  • index.js, line 122

render() → {ReactElement}

Renders the player
